# Stephen Titcombe's Professional Profile

## Overview
Product management professional with 5+ years experience in Agile development teams and 8+ years in functional software testing. Subject matter expert in Healthcare and Financial transaction processing solutions with a proven track record of delivering high-impact product solutions.

## Current Role & Recent Experience
- **Senior Product Owner** at Abarca Health
- Led greenfield product development projects
- Managed 400% YoY volume increase (15M to 80M+ claims) resulting in $1M annual savings
- Delivered 3 production applications and 3 proof-of-concept projects over 24 months
- Reduced daily processing timelines by up to 10 hours through iterative user feedback

## Core Expertise
- **Product Management**: Product discovery, roadmap development, feature prioritization
- **Agile Methodologies**: SAFe ceremonies, PI objectives, cross-team dependency coordination
- **User Experience**: UI/UX design using Figma, user story mapping, wireframe creation
- **Technical Skills**: SQL, ReactJS, TypeScript, Python, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
- **Healthcare Technology**: EDI ANSI X12, NCPDP, claims processing, pharmacy benefit management
- **Process Optimization**: Automated workflows, CI/CD expertise, system integration

## Technical Proficiencies
**Programming & Development**: Python, SQL, ReactJS, TypeScript, C#
**Design & Prototyping**: Figma, Miro
**Data & Analytics**: Alteryx Designer, Excel, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
**DevOps & Tools**: Docker, Podman, GitHub Actions, Postman API, Jira, Confluence
**Platforms**: SharePoint, Microsoft Office Suite

## Industry Experience
- **Healthcare Technology**: Pharmacy benefit management, claims processing, regulatory compliance
- **Financial Services**: Investment management, brokerage operations, regulatory compliance
- **Insurance**: Claims analysis, risk assessment, SOC2 compliance

## Education & Certifications
- **Bachelor's Degree**: Gustavus Adolphus College
- **Study Abroad**: Rome, Italy (IES Abroad)
- **Certifications**: Certified Scrum Master (Scrum Alliance), Product Management (Management & Strategy Institute)

## Leadership & Collaboration
- Cross-functional team leadership and mentoring
- Stakeholder management across technical and business teams
- Client relationship management and vendor coordination
- Change management and process improvement initiatives

## Professional Strengths
- Rapid learning and technology adoption
- Problem identification and solution-oriented thinking
- Strong analytical and data-driven decision making
- Excellent communication and documentation skills
- Bridge between technical and business stakeholders

## Contact Context
This profile represents a product management professional with deep expertise in healthcare technology and financial services, combining technical skills with strong business acumen and leadership capabilities.
